Rentals

Browse Gallery

Multi-Purpose Room Rentals

Hall Information

Ready to book? Navigate to our booking reservation system: Book now!

Looking for affordable, fair space to host small events and social gathering such as;

  • -Birthday Parties
  • -Bridal Showers
  • -Baby Showers
  • -Sharing Circles
  • -Staff Meetings
  • -Presentations
  • -Craft Sales
  • -Orientations
  • -Training Sessions
  • -Small Arts/Crafts Exhibit

Our hall might be the perfect venue for you. For more information or require tour to our place please call us at rentals@ralphbrowncc.com

Rental Includes

  • -Full access to the centre, including kitchen, multi-purpose room, and general area.
  • -Access to chairs and folding tables.
  • -Use of kitchen facilities include fridge, freezer, stove and two open ovens.
  • -Basic cleaning supplies (garbage bags, dish soap, clothes, etc.) will be available.
  • -Bathroom supplies including toilet paper, paper towels and hand soap.

Additional Information

For MPR booking let us know the following;

  • -Type of event you holding
  • -Your contact information
  • -Date including start time and end time
  • -Number of people attending

Rent Fees

  • Regular Rental Fee
    $25.00 - per hour (with minimum 4 hours)
    $25.00 - for each additional hours
  • Refundable Damage Deposit
    $100.00 or 50% (whichever is more) - Deposit
    - Deducted Damage Fees may apply
    For more information check Rental Agreement Terms and Conditions (Upon Request) Contact: rentals@ralphbrowncc.com
